review: I was using a blue ray player to access Netflix and Amazon, etc. and it always took a long time to load up.  We just hooked up the fire stick and it is so much quicker and easier to navigate.  It's probably my imagination, but the picture seems sharper as well.

review: Turns out Fire Stick is not compatible with my cable Arris 628 Modem. Customer service sent me a Neatgear router but I have had problems with using 2 routers. Has been very frustrating. No number for Neatgear support.
author: James Troutman

review: Absolutely the best purchase I've ever made in a long time. It's so easy to use and set up. It took me I think not even 10 minutes to set it up and watch something. If I can recommend one thing it would be to buy the power cord that fits in you usb in your tv to get rid of some of the wires cause the plug it comes with isn't the longest but it depends how your TV and everything is set up. I mean what else could you want. You can play games watch Netflix listen to spotify and so much more. I definitely recommend this to anyone
author: Casey Pietro

review: I have used this 2 times watching a 2 hour movie each time on Netflixs.  Well with 1 hour and 50 minutes the Amazon fire sticks looses connection to the internet,  After having this happen right at the end of the movies 2 times, kinda ruins the whole movie.  Checking around to find out what is happened to the fire stick.  It gets very hot and shuts off by its self!  I think I'm going to return to Amazon.
